comments.comment: Eknaligoda jeewathun athara sitinawa nam me video clip walin  prakasha wuna anawaranaya kalaa Eknaligoda Dubai ratey thawath indian kaathawak samanga viwahawela hotel eka inna bawa, ay rate eknaligoda athurudan wela thibiyadhi ay ae gana viparam kara baluwe naththe? Eknaligoda gana ohuge birinda athrudan wela kiya kiya aurudu keepayak chisse hoyanawa, namuth me videowa thulin aranchi eknaligoda indian ganiyek samanga viwahawela hotelaka wasaya karana bawa. Ehemanam birindata Dubai gihin ohu inna thanin soya balanna puluwan neada.? Eknaligodage birindata me prawurthya aranchinam wahama kathawa aththada kiya dannawanam aanduwe udawwen Dubai ratey lanka Ambassy maargayen ohuwa allagatha haki neada. Aya mema siddiya ekko nodana sitinawanam me bawa  Eknaligoda birindata angawanna  puluwan neada. Aya awruduru gananaawakak thamage purushaya soya soyaa duk vlndlnna mohothe ayata me aaranchiya aththanam monatharam sathutudaayaka aaranchiyakdha...... Janamadhiyen me bawa ratata helikaranna. Ekko Eknaligodata lankawata paminenna pulan thathwayaka novai dubaiwa randhi inney.......  Madhu maadawa mema thorathura ratatama helidaraw kala.. Ohuta puluwanne megana wiparam kara  siddiya  soya balaa  kathawa aththanam aanduwata ho Eknaligodage birindata ohuwa genna ganna katayuthu karanna.hakineda? Eknaligoda jeewathun athara inna bawa helikaranna....??? Thawada ekko Eknaligodata thamunge baariyawa ha lamain munagahenne akamaththen ohu kapati kamen maga arinawa wenna puluwan..,.... Kaanthaawak vlvaha kara gena thamunge kalin bariyaawa ha lamaingen aath wela innawada danne naha samaharavita.. Me kathaawa aththanam.....

replies.replyComment: mod pako da thaksanaya diyunui,oye maduta wisatara kiwa malli langa phone ekka wath tibila nedda ban video ekkak ho 4to ekak ganna,mun me andanne thopima thamai ban,wisesayenma sinhala bawuda wechcha api nemi thopima thama mu me ganata andanne,kiyana ekata kisaima thaksanayak ne oka sakksi athiwa oppu karanna,anika kiyana mallita ikmanata mehe ekekuta kiyala mahidage ekek genawanna thibuna ne,anika eka dawasin dakala eka dawasin eknaligoda villa eka dala giye nane,hariyatama mu allanna yanakota eknaligoda gihin,anith karanawa thama ada toilet ekth cctv cam tiyanawa oye dubai villa eke cctv cam nadda dan nane mdumadawa,chuttak hoyala balnna barida madu e gana,mun hamadama kale sinhala baudda apiwa gona karala munge desapalanaya karapu ekai unge manpa wadi kara gaththa ekai,gani hadaganna bari eka mun apiwa gonnu karanawa,yako para desapalanaya karanna epa,oye kiyana gon pakata ekandu sakki yak oppu karala pennawan taram ganna bari une aida ban,ada diyunui thaksanemowa hondai nadu thope baiyanta,mu sakki ,mu bank card eka room eka tiyalai 4n eka  genna gihille muta bari una bank card eka aran yanna uge room ekata 4to gahala ho gihin thiyanna,aanika mama nam bank card ekama ussnawa me taram watina sakkiyak kawuda ban nati kara ganna,malli kiyanawa vidio karagannath bari unalu,ane muta pissuda ban apita pissu,hoyapiya tho marenakanwath ehema kenak hamuwena ekak nemdan eknaligida moru kawad akiyanna danne morath,eknaligodath,tnak ekata dapu ekat pamani

comments.comment: Boruwak nowana bawa mata viswasai, unp aka aya usaviyat borukeyala namada agamathikama nawatha gatha, thawa tika dawasak yana kota penavi aththatama kauda ratata adare keyala. Madumadawa keynna boruwaknewa  keyala mata hodatama viswasai. Ape sinhalaya danna aththa katha karana minihawa pagala kotala marala dannai. Aeth meka budunge ratak.madumadawa keyanna boruwak nam kawada hare sobadaremaya visin daduwandevi.ai kalabalawenna?
